title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Interaction Between Technology Use and Learning Skills: Simulation-Based Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the impact of technology usage types (games, search, smartphones) on language learning skills (abstract conceptualization, concrete experience, reflective observation) using structural equation modeling.
Learners can design learning efficiency diagnostic tools by linking technology usage patterns with cognitive load theory.
Learners can develop context-specific language learning strategies using VR simulations in limited technology environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
